New game mode: Humble Builder


Version 1.4 - 05/28/2015: Added a new game mode called " Humble Builder ", without enemies. Perfect for those who want to take it easy! :)

Achievements, Leaderboards and Cloud Saves available!


Version 1.3 - 02/26/2015:

  • Added Steam Achievements, Leaderboards and Cloud Saves :)
  • Changed system (now published in AIR) and the mouse controls respond much better, even in times of lag
  • You can now chose from a wide range of different resolutions
  • The game now keeps money collected from the levels you failed, so you can't be stuck anymore because you don't have enough money ^_^
  • Made a few optimizations
  • Translated the remaining texts

Trading Cards available!


Version 1.2 - 01/30/2015:

  • Added Steam Badges, Trading Cards, BGs and Emoticons :)
  • You can now select a piece by simply clicking on it, then clicking the right spot under the crane. (As well as drag n' drop)
  • Lady Vikeba is less expensive in the Normal mode
  • Increased the loading speed of items (when you have none)
  • Characters give you tips in the first levels. (English and French only at the moment, will add other languages in the next update)
Steam Achievements & Leaderboards coming in the next update (February or March 2015)

READ MORE

About This Game

Become the best castle builder in this original and addictive game where you must at the same time create a castle accurately while protecting it from all the annoying baddies.

Features

  • Unique concept, engaging and addictive game-play
  • 18 levels in the normal mode, 15 for the King Mode (Extra Hard), and 4 rounds of "Protect the Castle" mode (Survival)
  • Upgrade your castle-building equipment and collect items to get rid of the villains
  • 30 trophies to unlock (achievements)
  • 20 atlas pages to unlock (character descriptions and tips)
  • Funny characters and events with cartoonish graphics

Story and Concept

Monarchs come to you with a specific castle request, and your job is to build their dream palace piece by piece before the deadline without making mistakes. In the meantime, enemies come in and try to break your castle. They will try to burn it, explode it or even steal the pieces but you must get rid of them with the right items to reclaim control!
In "Protect the Castle" mode, you must keep the pre-made castles intact as much as possible by dealing with swarms of enemies attempting to take over... thankfully you have unlimited items in this frantic mode since the enemies are unlimited, too!
READ MORE

System Requirements

    Minimum:
    • OS: XP and later
    • Processor: Single 2 GHz or Dual 1.6 GHz
    • Memory: 512 MB RAM
    • Hard Drive: 70 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: XP and later
    • Processor: Single 3 GHz or Dual 2.2 GHz
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Hard Drive: 70 MB available space

El Kemosabe
877 products in account
140 reviews
Not Recommended
0.6 hrs on record
Posted: February 22
Castle is a simplistic strategy game where you build castles for different rulers. While building the castles you must fend off attackers who are trying to destroy your castle or stop you from building it.

+Nice cartoony graphics that look quite qood when on the maximum settings (anything less than maximum on resolution and graphic settings looks horrible)
+Quite a few levels
+Backgrounds on the levels look nice
+Money you earn from the levels allows to purchase upgrades as well as tools to fight off attackers
+Has achievements and trading cards

-It feels too much like a flash game
-Steep difficulty curve
-New gameplay mechanics are introduced through overly-simplistic pictures rather than text which aren't helpful at all
-Gets boring extremely quickly
-Price is too high for what it is so if you want it buy it on sale
-You can't replay levels

Verdict:
4

It's a nice idea but it gets boring quickly and it feels too much like a flash game for the price tag, buy it on sale if you buy it at all.

El K.

genkicoll
981 products in account
19 reviews
Not Recommended
0.5 hrs on record
Posted: March 21
Someone remind me why I wanted this game, again? Sure, it looks like a flash game, but I enjoy flash games! This one... not so much >_< See the big old hour glass in the screens? It's not for bonuses if you finish in time, it's GAME OVER if you don't finish in time! It's frantic and super-clicky, and I only lasted a few simple castles before I could no longer progress.

I recommend getting this game when it's bundled. If you like being incredibly stressed, go for it! If you're like me, you'll hate it, but redeem it anyway and get your cards -- at least that's one good thing I can say about the game!
